price: Mo Awurade Nyankopͻn no Ɔyε Awurade baako, Awurade (foforͻ) biara nni hͻ gyesε Ɔno nko ara. Ɔne Ahummͻborͻ Hene no, Ɔdεεfoͻ Hene no.
arabic: وَإِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun lā ilāha illā huwa al-raḥmānu al-raḥīmu
